sections.name: Description
sections.text: An exquisite sword cane is a sword sheathed inside a hollow cane, which itself can be used as a clubbing weapon with or without the sword sheathed inside.

traits.name: Agile
traits.text: The multiple attack penalty you take with this weapon on the second attack on your turn is –4 instead of –5, and –8 instead of –10 on the third and subsequent attacks in the turn.

traits.name: Stance
traits.text: A stance is a general combat strategy that you enter by using an action with the stance trait, and that you remain in for some time. A stance lasts until you get knocked out, until its requirements (if any) are violated, until the encounter ends, or until you enter a new stance, whichever comes first. After you use an action with the stance trait, you can’t use another one for 1 round. You can enter or be in a stance only in encounter mode.

traits.name: Gremlin
traits.text: Cruel and mischievous fey, gremlins have acclimated to life in the Universe.

traits.name: Coatl
traits.text: A family of supernatural feathered serpents who serve as guardians and messengers in the Universe for various holy divinities.

traits.name: Concentrate
traits.text: An action with this trait requires a degree of mental concentration and discipline.

group.name: Sword
group.text: The target is made off-balance by your attack, becoming off-guard until the start of your next turn.
